=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Breathe
Review Date: 2018/02/22
Categories: Drama, Romance, Heartwarming, Inspiring
Product Description: ['The inspiring true love story of Robin and Diana Cavendish, an adventurous couple who refuse to give up in the face of a devastating disease.']
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Andy Serkis'], 'Producers': ['Jonathan Cavendish'], 'Starring': ['Andrew Garfield', 'Claire Foy', 'Diana Rigg']}
Review Text: This is a well acted drama and true story.  It was inspiration and full of love.  I highly recommend it.
Review Title: Movie was inspirational and a good reminder to live life to the fullest!
Rating: 5.0

profile:
**User Summary:**

This user exhibits a strong preference for emotionally engaging films and series, particularly those showcasing prominent performances, with a noted admiration for actors like Tom Hardy and Peter Dinklage. Their discerning taste for quality storytelling is underscored by their recent high rating of a drama featuring Dinklage, emphasizing a continued appreciation for well-developed characters and impactful narratives.

The user recently expressed their admiration for an inspirational true story characterized by heartfelt themes of love and resilience, further affirming their inclination towards character-driven stories that resonate personally. Their reviews consistently reflect a deep engagement with content that explores the human condition and diverse perspectives, reinforcing a commitment to high-caliber filmmaking.

Additionally, the user maintains a strong focus on accessibility features, evident in their consistent preference for audio descriptions and subtitles, showcasing dedication to inclusivity in media consumption. Their ongoing engagement with well-crafted, emotionally resonant dramas highlights a preference for storytelling that is both engaging and accessible to wider audiences.

Overall, the user leans toward high-quality, character-centric films and series with strong performances, consistently supporting content that champions accessibility and diverse experiences. This reinforces their dedication to exceptional storytelling in their viewing choices, as seen in their latest interaction, blending inspiration and emotional depth.
